ref: 8106 pāyáyati1 ʻ brings over, rescues, brings to an end ʼ RV., ʻ is a match for ʼ Mn. ʻ is capable of ʼ Kāv. [~ pāláyati. -- √pr̥ and (in mng. ʻ accomplish, be able ʼ) &rcirclemacr Pa. pārēti ʻ makes go through, bores through ʼ, Pk. pārēi ʻ crosses, completes, is able (= pāraï) ʼ, pāriya<-> ʻ ended ʼ; Gy. germ. par -- , parəv -- ʻ to deal with, exchange ʼ, gr. paruv -- ʻ to exchange ʼ, wel. pā̊rav -- ʻ to change, exchange, change oneself ʼ, pal. párăr ʻ takes, buys, conceives ʼ; Pr. par -- ʻ to win ʼ; K. pārun ʻ to complete ʼ; S. pāraṇu ʻ to perform, fulfil, make equal ʼ; Ku. pārṇo ʻ to produce ʼ; N. pārnu ʻ to make, cause, use ʼ (collides with pārnu < pātáyati); A. pāriba ʻ to be able ʼ, B. pārā; Or. pāribā ʻ to be able, grow up ʼ; OMth. pāraï ʻ is able ʼ, Mth. pārab ʻ to take across ʼ; OAw. pāraï ʻ completes, fulfils, is able ʼ; H. pārnā ʻ to accomplish, finish ʼ; OG. pārīya ʻ completed ʼ; M. pārṇẽ ʻ to make nutritious or salutary ʼ.
